delete.summary: Uninstall application
delete.description: Uninstalls the specified application deactivating it first if necessary.

get.summary: Gets applicationId entry by either id or name

get.description: Returns array of all installed applications.

Uploads application archive stream and optionally activates the
application.

get.description: Returns array of all registered application ids.

post.summary: Activate application

delete.summary: De-activate application

post.description: Forms ONOS cluster using the uploaded JSON definition.

get.description: Returns array of all cluster nodes.

get.description: Returns details of the specified cluster node.

get.summary: Gets configuration of the specified component

post.summary: Selectively sets configuration properties
post.description: Sets only the properties present in the JSON request.

delete.summary: Selectively clears configuration properties
delete.description: Clears only the properties present in the JSON request.

get.summary: Gets all component configurations
get.description: Returns collection of all registered component configurations.

get.summary: Gets all device keys
get.description: Returns array of all device keys.

post.summary: Adds a new device key from the JSON input stream

get.summary: Gets a single device key by device key unique identifier
get.description: Returns the specified device key.

delete.summary: Removes a device key by device key identifier

get.summary: Gets all infrastructure devices
get.description: Returns array of all discovered infrastructure devices.

get.summary: Gets details of infrastructure device
get.description: Returns details of the specified infrastructure device.

delete.summary: Removes infrastructure device
delete.description:
Administratively deletes the specified device from the inventory of
known devices.

get.summary: Gets ports of infrastructure device
get.description: Returns details of the specified infrastructure device.

post.summary: Add new dpi statistics entry at the end of list

Creates and installs a new forwarding objective for the specified device

get.summary: Gets flow rules generated by an application
get.description: Returns the flow rule specified by the application id.

delete.summary: Removes flow rules by application ID
delete.description: Removes a collection of flow rules generated by the given application.

get.summary: Gets all flow entries
get.description: Returns array of all flow rules in the system.

post.summary: Creates new flow rules
post.description:
Creates and installs a new flow rules.
Flow rule criteria and instruction description: https://wiki.onosproject.org/display/ONOS/Flow+Rules

delete.summary: Removes a batch of flow rules

get.summary: Gets flow rules
get.description:
Returns the flow entry specified by the device id and
flow rule id.

delete.summary: Removes flow rule

get.summary: Gets flow entries of a device
get.description:
Returns array of all flow rules for the
specified device.

post.summary: Creates new flow rule
post.description:
Creates and installs a new flow rule for the specified device.
Flow rule criteria and instruction description: https://wiki.onosproject.org/display/ONOS/Flow+Rules

get.summary: Returns all groups of all devices
Returns all groups associated with the given device

post.summary: Create new group rule
post.description:
Creates and installs a new group rule for the
specified device.

get.summary: Returns a group with the given deviceId and appCookie

delete.summary: Removes the specified group

parameters.name: appCookie
parameters.description: application cookie to be used for lookup

get.summary: Get details of end-station host with MAC/VLAN
get.description: Returns detailed properties of the specified end-station host.

delete.summary: Removes infrastructure device
delete.description:
Administratively deletes the specified device from the inventory of
known devices.

get.summary: Get details of end-station host
get.description: Returns detailed properties of the specified end-station host.

get.summary: Get all end-station hosts
get.description: Returns array of all known end-station hosts.

post.summary:
Creates a new host based on JSON input and adds it to the current
host inventory

get.summary: Gets all related flow entries created by a particular intent
get.description: Returns all flow entries of the specified intent.

get.summary: Gets all intents
get.description: Returns array containing all the intents in the system.

post.summary: Submits a new intent
post.description: Creates and submits intent from the JSON request.

get.summary: Gets intent by application and key
get.description: Returns details of the specified intent.

delete.summary: Withdraws intent
delete.description: Withdraws the specified intent from the system.

get.summary: Gets infrastructure links
get.description: Returns array of all links, or links for the specified device or port.

get.summary:
Returns controllers connected to a given device, in order of
preference
get.description: The first entry in the list is the current master.

put.summary: Applies the current mastership role for the specified device

parameters.name: stream
parameters.description: JSON representation of device, node, mastership info

get.summary:
Balances the mastership to be shared as evenly as possibly by all
online instances

Returns the mastership status of the local controller for a given
device forcing master selection if necessary
Returns the current master for a given device
Returns the devices for which a controller is master

Abandons mastership of the specified device on the local node thus
forcing selection of a new master
get.description:
If the local node is not a master
for this device, no master selection will occur.

get.summary: Returns the role of the local node for the specified device
Returns all meters of all devices
Returns a meter by the meter id

delete.summary: Removes the specified meter

get.summary: Returns a collection of meters by the device id

post.summary: Creates new meter rule
post.description:
Creates and installs a new meter rule for the
specified device.

get.summary: Gets stats information of a metric
get.description:
Returns array of all information for the
specified metric.

get.summary: Gets stats information of all metrics
get.description:
Returns array of all information for
all metrics.

get.summary: Get all multicast routes
get.description: Returns array of all known multicast routes.

delete.summary: Remove a multicast route
delete.description: Removes a route from the multicast RIB.

post.summary: Create a sink for a multicast route
post.description: Creates a new sink for an existing multicast route.
